trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_SEQ_00<tab>M'septha has the look of a woman with questions that beg for answers.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Ananta at Vira Nilya.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_TODO_01<tab>Report to M'septha.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_TODO_02<tab>Obtain resin from the designated location.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the resin-filled jar to M'septha.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_001<tab>Excuse me, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>. Can you spare a moment?
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_002<tab>We'll be meeting to barter with the Ananta soon, and I'd like to surprise them with something more than our usual wares. Something special.

TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_003<tab>I'd like to find out what sorts of things they actually need, but they're like to discover my plans if I were to ask them directly. That's where you come in. I need you to go and speak with them for me.

TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_004<tab>No need to question <var 1A 02 /var>everyone<var 1A 01 /var> in the village, of course. If you strike up conversation with even five of the Ananta I'm sure you'll learn plenty. Then I can see to preparing goods they'll truly enjoy.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_010<tab>Speaking with everyone at Vira Nilya would be overly ambitious. Five of the Ananta should be more than enough to figure out what they're looking for.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_JAYANTI_000_020<tab>Sssorry, but I have no time to talk. I must see to my sssisters' fencing lessons.

TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_NANDINA_000_030<tab>Hm? We were dissscussing what to do about our upcoming meeting with the M tribe. I made a grievous error taking ssstock of our arrows. I fear we will come up short if sssomething is not done soon.

TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MANIK_000_040<tab>I would give anything for a new pair of gloves. My ssskin is quite delicate, you see, and these gloves tend to chafe my arms. Sssadly the thread I need is not easy to come by.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_GARIMA_000_050<tab>Is my trouble written ssso plainly on my face? If you mussst know, I worry the poison we lace our arrows with is too potent.

TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_GARIMA_100_050<tab>One ssslip of the hand and we would be irreparably ssscarred, forever depriving the world of our unequaled beauty. Jussst the thought of it is too much to bear.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_PALLAVI_000_060<tab>deleted

TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_PRAPTI_000_060<tab>Why do I ssseem so bothered? My sssisters are constantly fawning over me. “How are your ssscales so lussstrous and sssmooth?” “You mussst tell us where you get your rouge.” “I wish I had your hourglasss figure.” <sigh> It'sss not easy being beautiful.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_070<tab>Welcome back. I trust your talks with the Ananta were enlightening?
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_071<tab>I see. I didn't realize their stocks of supplies were so lacking. Anything else?

TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_100_072<tab>The poison for their arrows is <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> potent? I imagine such a potential irritant to the skin would prove troublesome when preparing their arrows. Especially given their aversion to anything that might blemish their skin.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_072<tab>I've got it! I will make them long gloves to protect against their poisons. They'll need a special coating, and I'll need your help to get it.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_073<tab>Take this container to East End and fill it with resin from the trees there. I will see to readying fabric for the gloves.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_074<tab>The resin from the trees of East End is quite resilient. The Ananta will have nothing to fear with gloves using that as a protective coating.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>You tap the tree, but it fails to yield any resin.
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_090<tab>How did you fare at East End?
TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_091<tab>Good, good. This is more than enough. The Ananta will be quite pleased.

TEXT_STMBDZ719_02822_MSEPTHA_000_092<tab>You may be surprised to know that we've had altercations with the Ananta a time or two over territory disputes. Thankfully we've managed to settle things, and this bartering of goods helps maintain good relations. Thanks to you, we can keep doing just that.
